category: Click Boards > Display & LED > LED segment
name: mikroe.click.bargraph
short_description: BarGraph click is a 10-segment bar graph display click, which uses a high-quality bar graph LED display. The bar graph display is a very popular device for displaying various properties, whether it be an audio level, current/voltage level, the position of the encoder, or any other property that can be displayed in a form of a bar graph.
